sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些动词均含有"证明，证实"之意。
means: prove ： 普通用词，指通过某种手段或方式提供证据以证实或证明某事物真实与否，某结论正确与否等情况。
certify ： 较正式用词，多指有签字盖章的、合符法律程序的书面证明。
demonstrate ： 指通过推理、辩论、实验或以实例来证明事物的正确与否。常用于理论、学说、定律等的证明上。
establish ： 指证实事实或理论的真实性与正确性，使其能长期存在或为人们所接受。
testify ： 较正式用词，既指出庭作证，提供证据，又指为某人或某事的是否真实提供证据或证明。

sentence.Network_en: I have to prove myself as a respectable, balanced, person.
sentence.Network_cn: 我必须证明自己是个正派、稳重的人。

sentence.Network_en: If they prove ineffective they should be demoted or asked to retire.
sentence.Network_cn: 如果事实证明他们已无力胜任，应该将他们降级或让他们退休。

sentence.Network_en: There is the strong possibility that such cooperation will prove unworkable.
sentence.Network_cn: 这种合作很有可能会行不通。

jx.jx_en_mean: (Scots Law)a verdict that there is insufficient evidence to establish guilt or innocence

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French prover, from Latin probare 'test, approve, demonstrate', from probus 'good'

encyclopedia.content: prove英音：[pru:v]美音：[pruv] 以下结果由译典通提供词典解释 及物动词 vt. 1.证明，证实[+(that)][O8][O2] I'll prove to the world that he was right. 我将向世人证明他是对的。 The lawyer proved the innocence of his client. 律师证实了他的当事人的清白。 2.表现，显示[O8][O9][O2] She has proved herself unreliable. 她的表现说明她靠不住。 3.查验；检验 4.【数】验算 5.【律】认证锛堃胖鲲級 不及物动词 vi. 1.证

entry.def: If something proves to be true or to have a particular quality, it becomes clear after a period of time that it is true or has that quality.

example.ex: We have been accused of exaggerating before, but unfortunately all our reports proved to be true...
example.tran: 以前一直有人指责我们夸大事实，但遗憾的是，我们所有的报道都证明是真实的。

example.ex: In the past this process of transition has often proven difficult.
example.tran: 过去这一过渡过程常常很艰难。

entry.def: If you prove that something is true, you show by means of argument or evidence that it is definitely true.

example.ex: You brought this charge. You prove it!...
example.tran: 你提出了这项控告。你拿出证据来！

example.ex: The results prove that regulation of the salmon farming industry is inadequate.
example.tran: 结果证明对鲑鱼饲养行业的管理不够完善。

entry.def: If you prove yourself to have a certain good quality, you show by your actions that you have it.

example.ex: Margaret proved herself to be a good mother...
example.tran: 玛格丽特证明了自己是个好妈妈。

example.ex: As a composer he proved himself adept at large dramatic forms...
example.tran: 身为作曲家的他证明了自己在创作大型戏剧方面驾轻就熟。

entry.tran: 证明自己的能力（或知识）
entry.def: If you prove a point, you show other people that you know something or can do something, although your action may have no other purpose.

example.ex: They made a 3,000 mile detour simply to prove a point.
example.tran: 他们绕行3,000英里只是为了证明自己能够做到。

means.word_mean: 1. be shown or be found to be;

sentences.sentence: "The medicine turned out to save her life"

means.word_mean: 2. establish the validity of something, as by an example, explanation or experiment;

sentences.sentence: "The experiment demonstrated the instability of the compound"
"The mathematician showed the validity of the conjecture"
"The blood test showed that he was the father"

means.word_mean: 4. prove formally; demonstrate by a mathematical, formal proof
5. put to the test, as for its quality, or give experimental use to;

sentences.sentence: "This approach has been tried with good results"
"the dough rose slowly in the warm room"

means.word_mean: 7. cause to puff up with a leaven;

auth_sentence.content: I've never gone out to prove people wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content: I've never gone out to prove people wrong.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I've never gone out to prove people wrong.

auth_sentence.content: But why has it been so difficult to prove?
auth_sentence.res_content: But why has it been so difficult to prove?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But why has it been so difficult to prove?

auth_sentence.content: He had nothing left to prove as a warrior.
auth_sentence.res_content: He had nothing left to prove as a warrior.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: He had nothing left to prove as a warrior.

stems_affixes.word_buile: approve赞成,赞许,同意+al表名词→n.批准,通过;赞成,同意
improve[v.改善, 改进]+ment表名词→n.改进,进步

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证据, 试验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: proof=prov测试,证明→n.&v.证据, 试验, 考验

stems_affixes.value_cn: [of]赞成,赞许,同意;批准,审议,通过
stems_affixes.word_buile: ap加强+prov测试,证明+e→证明可行
dis不+approve赞成,赞许,同意→v.不赞成,不同意[批准]
dis不+prov测试,证明+e→v.证明…不正确,反证
im进入+prove检验, 考验→进入试验→改善, 改进

stems_affixes.value_cn: 证明, 证实, 检验, 考验
stems_affixes.word_buile: prov测试,证明+e→v.证明, 证实, 检验, 考验 v.原来[是], 证明[是]
re反+prov测试,证明+e→反[别人]证明→责骂

Sentence.sentence: They prove to be a good alternative to petroleum.
It proves profitable to both sides.
The crisis will prove hugely disruptive (破坏性的), however.
This experiment certainly does not definitely prove that girls start to reason before boys, but it provides a clue that scientists would like to study more carefully.
The change cut their expenditures in half, but the new living arrangement proved too challenging.
To prove that she could earn her living as a gardener.

sentences.en: They were not able to prove these suspicions.
sentences.cn: 这些怀疑他们无法证实。

sentences.en: How can you prove that you are right?
sentences.cn: 你如何能证明你是正确的呢?

sentences.en: The students are asked to prove the purity of copper.
sentences.cn: 要求学生们检验铜的纯度。

jushi.english: This has afterwards proved to be the correct explanation.
jushi.chinese: 后来证明这是正确的解释。

jushi.english: She may prove to be the most suitable person for the job.
jushi.chinese: 可能证明她最适合做这工作。

jushi.english: The report proved to be true.
